疘字的基本解释

疘
gāng
〔脱疘〕古同“脱肛”，直肠或乙状结肠从肛门脱出的病。

疘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāng］［gōng］
［《廣韻》古紅切，平東，見。］
病名，脱肛，即直肠脱垂。

疘字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疘； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页769第10
【唐韻】古紅切【集韻】沽紅切，?音公。脫疘，下部病。

anus
Basic explanation of words
anus
gāng
[Prolapse] In ancient times, it was the same as "prolapse of the anus", a disease in which the rectum or sigmoid colon prolapsed from the anus.
anus
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāng］［gōng］
["Guangyun" Gu Hongqi, Pingdong, see. ]
The name of the disease is prolapse of the anus, that is, rectal prolapse.
